description: Russia's president marks a holiday by promoting a reform that could keep him in office until 2036.
title: Putin makes first public appearance in weeks of lockdown in Russia
title_page: Putin makes first public appearance in weeks of lockdown in Russia - BBC News
maintext: His last public appearance was on 9 May when he attended a Victory Day ceremony - the traditional parade has been postponed until 24 June. Since then he had been working from his country residence outside Moscow.
